ygData.subject: Re: On Tinkering books
ygData.msgSnippet: I checked EVERY NPC IN and Around Akanon there are no others with books (On Fen Ro at least).  What is the big deal about the flameless lantern??  Why is it
ygData.messageBody:
I checked EVERY NPC IN and Around Akanon there are no others with books (On
Fen Ro at least). What is the big deal about the flameless lantern?? Why
is it better than a normal. Also A Bower says we can make improved
longbows for them.

<-- Enigma -->
Tech Supervisor of The Door ISP
http://members.door.net/enigma
UIN:364996



-----Original Message-----
From: Rick Jones [SMTP:rjones@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 4:27 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] On Tinkering books

From: "Rick Jones" <rjones@...>



mstokes wrote:

> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Well I bought my tool kit and the two books from the tinkering vendor
> last night. After reading I've come to the conclusion that there must
> be more books somewhere, as these two seem to center on "higher level"
> projects. Tonight I hope to talk to every NPC in Ak'anon for the
> remainder of the books especially the ones that contain firewater and
> collapsible fishing poles. I will keep you posted on my results.
>
> Malkin
>

Firewater is the first thing you can make. I'll tell you this much, I
didn't find
it in the two books. But was emailing the guy (can't remember his name,
it's
in my email) who works on Trade skills. He kept suggesting that it's in the

books. He of course didn't mention which books. I talked to the NPC's
is Ak'Anon, all of them I could find. Nada and more zip. I do know how
to make Firewater, but it came from my emails not the game. It is possible
that there is an NPC I missed, I've been through more then twice. I was
hoping
it was a quest, but haven't found it yet. May try Gnome's in Steamfont? Or
if you're brave the ones in Mino Cave. Or in Lesser Fay.

-Zikkin

P.S. I can post the items that make up Firewater or just email me.
